replies.body:
{{champion:59}} Today the day Arclight Vel'koz comes down to grace us with his presence. 

{{champion:50}} Thanks to him there are no wars

{{champion:222}} No Anarchy 

{{champion:266}} No Bloodshed 

{{champion:32}} Everyone friendly with each other

{{champion:58}} I love you brother

{{champion:75}} I love you too brother

{{champion:25}} I sorry for fighting sis.  

{{champion:10}} I'm happy to have you back. 

{{champion:101}} Here he comes

{{champion:103}} We love you Vel'koz

{{champion:268}} You are our savor Vel'koz

{{champion:161}}** Thank you. Thank you. You are all to kind, but I couldn't of done all of this without the one person who was always there for me: Helmet Bro. **

{{summoner:7}} Thank you Vel'koz

{{champion:161}} **No, no. Thank you. **


*Back in the Void*

{{champion:161}}** AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!! *Deep breath* What the actual heck was that!? Why would I share my knowledge with these lower life forms? I should of been disintegrating them. Mmmmm...must of been that Graggy Ice I try last night. I must find it source...and destroy it. **
Obviously Vel'Koz wasn't able to end all grief. {{champion:17}} still alive.
{{champion:64}}  I didn't see him anywhere
{{champion:127}} Neither did I.
{{champion:11}} I saw him
{{champion:21}} 's nightmare?
Flat chested...nuff said.
Waking up next to Gangplank... nuff said

Keep it up lightdragoon!
you've got a gift for writing.
I love to see your stories.
You, evidently, do not haha. (My joke is that you spelled writing as "righting" just in case you were wondering xD )
oh, my bad just woke up. :3

Thank you helmet bro we will never forget you...

3rd comment. Lightdragon made a a story about Vel'Koz. Vel'Koz has three tentacles. ILLUMINATI CONFIRMED! {{item:2050}} {{item:2044}} {{item:2043}} {{champion:17}}
It's DRAG**OO**N, not dragon.
Dragoon has two O's. Vel'koz has 3 tentacles. 3-2=1!! Illuminati has 1 eye! Lightdragoon is illuminati confirmed.
Dragoons wield spears, right?

Final Fantasy version of Dragoon do. 

Dragoons in history were usually armor soldiers on horseback that fought with guns and small swords.
What bout' Kirby's Dragoon?  That thing blew up a dimension crossing ship over 1000 times its' size effortlessly! Not bad for a pink puffball

I'm the second comment, Got to  say something witty, funny, or of the like. 

*Racks brain*

i got nothing

{{champion:53}} LOG_48: BRAND_ENTRY_1

{{champion:63}} Um.....what are you doing, Braum?

{{champion:201}} Ah, making a new drink. I need goat's milk and fine Yordle hair.

{{champion:63}} That's great, Braum. Hey, why is no one inside the bar?

{{champion:201}} They all left, saying they had things to do.

{{champion:51}} Hey Braum, I got that Yordle hair you wanted.

{{champion:201}} Ah, thanks, who did you get it from?

{{champion:51}} I caught Teemo in my Yordle trap.

{{champion:63}} Serves him right.

{{champion:51}} I know, right? Anyways, I gotta go.

{{champion:201}} Bye.

{{champion:63}} So, where do you plan on getting goat's milk?

{{champion:201}} I plan to trade with that Demacian, eh.....what's his name....ah, yes, Garen.

{{champion:63}} I see. So what else do you have in mind?

{{champion:201}} Nothing in the moment. Brand, you want a taste of my latest invention, Milk on a Bug?

{{champion:63}} No, thanks. I'll come with you to trade with Garen.

{{champion:201}} Sure thing. I was just about leaving.

*both walks away*

*to be continued*

I have an Idea for a Dr. Mundo skin that could be worth anywhere between 520 RP to 3250 RP. Fundo Mundo would be the name. The idea would be Dr. Mundo as a toy store employee. His q would throw a Dr. Mundo doll and wear a helicopter-hat, w would be jaw breakers flying around him, e would turn the doll into a lego sword, and ult would make him have a sugar rush (because hes faster) meaning he would have cotton candy flying off of him, with pink and blue instead of green healing effects. For the splash art Mundo could be standing next to a Nautilus cut out while selling tibbers to annie.
